AttrNamespaceURI.summary:
The read-only namespaceURI property of the interface returns the namespace URI of the attribute,
or null if the element is not in a namespace.

remarks.para:
The namespace URI is set at the creation and cannot be changed.
An attribute with a namespace can be created using .

blockquote.para:
Note: an attribute does not inherit its namespace from the element it is attached to.
If an attribute is not explicitly given a namespace, it has no namespace.

remarks.para:
The browser does not handle or enforce namespace validation per se. It is up to the JavaScript
application to do any necessary validation. Note, too, that the namespace prefix, once it
is associated with a particular attribute node, cannot be changed.

-The properties , returning the qualified name of the attribute, , the local part of the name, and , the namespace prefix.
-The property, equivalent to this one but for an .
-The method, creating an attribute with a given namespace.

AttrNamespaceURI.value: A string containing the URI of the namespace, or null if the attribute is not in a namespace.
